description:
How to unlock your purpose. Have you ever looked around at your life and asked "Is this all there is?" Perhaps you've attended the seminars and read the books, but you're still not richer, slimmer, happier or healthier. Have you ever asked "What is the purpose of my life?" Have you ever wondered what's stopping you from living a better life, the one you deserve? Then this course is for you.

BEWARE: I am an enthusiastic instructor. That's because I love what I do. If an enthusiastic style does not work for you, then this course is not for you :)

Be prepared to dive deep, to examine areas of your life you may never have examined before. This is the way to unlock your purpose. Although I recommend taking a day to learn and reflect on each of the 7 Powerful Ways to Unlock Your Purpose in Life, you set the pace for your learning experience. When you complete each activity for the 7 Powerful Ways to Unlock Your Purpose in Life, you will be one step closer to unlocking that purpose.

By the end of this course, you'll have a workbook devoted to unlocking your life's purpose. You'll gain remarkable insight and self knowledge around why your life has turned out the way it has. You'll know your top 3 values in life. And you'll formulate an effective goal using a simple but powerful formula. Diving deep into your automatic behaviour, you'll workshop new approaches to stop sabotaging and undermining yourself . And yes, you'll be well on your way to unlocking your life's purpose.
title: Purpose : 7 Powerful Ways to Unlock Your Purpose in Life
instructors: Master Practitioner of NLP Victoria Rose
